rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Vestibule
rooms.description: A welcoming open space with a traditional Kerala-style door leading into the main living areas. The room incorporates floor-to-ceiling windows along one wall to let in natural light.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious and inviting living area featuring Kerala-style woodwork and traditional stone flooring. Features floor-to-ceiling windows for optimal daylight.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: An area designed with a traditional Kerala aesthetic, featuring stone countertops and ample space for dining. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide ambient lighting.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet traditional kitchen design with local stone work and Kerala wood finishes. Equipped with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space that maintains traditional Kerala design elements. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide ample natural light and a serene ambiance.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Compact living area for domestic help. Designed with basic amenities, aligned with traditional Kerala architecture.

rooms.name: Ground Floor Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional and modern space designed for use by the household. Traditional finishes are used in line with Kerala style.

rooms.name: Storage/Courtyard Access
rooms.description: Space dedicated to storage and access to the inner courtyard. Incorporates local construction techniques and materials.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Traditional Kerala-style door with wood carvings and a decorative arch, serving as the primary entrance.

openings.name: Floor-to-Ceiling Window in Living Room
openings.description: Large window that extends from floor to ceiling, allowing for abundant natural light and ventilation.

openings.name: Floor-to-Ceiling Window in Kitchen
openings.description: Large window ensuring ample daylight enters the kitchen area.
